function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate testing capacity for a nation's population may lead to slow and incomplete assessment of infection status, allowing for undetected spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Delayed identification of infected individuals, leading to increased community transmission and higher risk of disease spread.","Mitigation":"Increase testing capacity, use alternative testing methods like wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE) to supplement clinical testing, implement efficient testing strategies for rapid and comprehensive assessment.","Technologies":"Wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE), improved clinical testing methods, efficient testing infrastructure and logistics.","People":"Entire population at risk of undetected spread of contagious diseases.","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies, public health organizations."},{"Description":"High cost of individual clinical testing for large populations may limit the frequency and scope of testing, leading to delayed or incomplete identification of infected individuals.","Impact":"Inadequate surveillance and detection of contagious diseases, leading to higher risk of community transmission and public health impact.","Mitigation":"Explore cost-effective and efficient testing alternatives such as wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE) to supplement clinical testing, invest in innovative testing technologies to reduce costs, allocate resources for comprehensive population surveillance.","Technologies":"Wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE), innovative testing technologies, cost-effective reagent production and distribution.","People":"Healthcare providers, government agencies, public health organizations.","Owner":"Healthcare providers, research institutions, government agencies."},{"Description":"Limited clinical testing capacity compared to population size may result in slow and costly screening processes, hindering effective assessment and management of contagious disease spread.","Impact":"Insufficient and delayed identification of infected individuals, leading to higher risk of undetected community transmission and public health impact.","Mitigation":"Expand clinical testing capacity, supplement clinical testing with alternative methods like wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE), invest in rapid and cost-effective testing technologies and infrastructure.","Technologies":"Wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE), rapid and cost-effective testing technologies, expanded testing infrastructure.","People":"Entire population at risk of undetected spread of contagious diseases.","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies, public health organizations."}]}
